state_history.change: Description: Commander of the expedition, an experienced and charismatic leader.. Motivation: Driven by a desire to make history and secure her legacy among the stars.
Description: The team's archaeologist, specializing in alien cultures.. Motivation: Seeks to understand the universe and prove his theories about interstellar civilizations.
Description: A brilliant engineer with a knack for alien technology.. Motivation: Wants to push the boundaries of human technology and find her place in history.
Description: A former military man tasked with the safety of the team.. Motivation: Motivated by duty and the protection of his team at all costs.

Description: A brilliant but overlooked astrobiologist, driven by a desire to make a monumental discovery.. Motivation: Proving her theories about extraterrestrial life and securing her place in scientific history.
Description: The mission commander, a seasoned astronaut with a military background.. Motivation: Ensuring the safety of his crew and the success of the mission.

Description: The determined leader of the exploration team, with a background in astrophysics and military strategy.. Motivation: Driven by the desire to make groundbreaking discoveries that could benefit humanity.
Description: The determined leader of the exploratory team, with a personal connection to the moon.. Motivation: To prove their deceased parent's theories about alien life were true.
Description: A young and enthusiastic technology specialist, fascinated by alien technologies.. Motivation: His curiosity and desire to understand the unknown.
Description: A skilled pilot and mechanic with a knack for getting out of tight spots.. Motivation: Seeks adventure and the thrill of the unknown.
Description: A linguist and communications expert, specializing in deciphering unknown languages.. Motivation: The challenge of unlocking the secrets of the artifact.

Description: A brilliant engineer and artifact specialist, known for her innovative solutions to complex problems.. Motivation: Wants to understand the technology behind the artifact to advance human technology.
Description: A brilliant but reclusive linguist and cryptologist, specialized in ancient languages.. Motivation: To decipher the artifact and gain academic renown.
Description: The team's biologist and medical officer, who is deeply empathetic and cautious.. Motivation: Hopes to find alien life forms and understand their ecosystems.
Description: A savvy ex-military pilot with a knack for getting in and out of trouble.. Motivation: Seeking adventure and a big payout.
Description: A tech genius and engineer, enthusiastic and curious about alien technologies.. Motivation: To understand and replicate alien technology.
Description: A brilliant but headstrong astrobiologist.. Motivation: To prove her controversial theories about alien life.
Description: A seasoned yet cynical space explorer.. Motivation: To lead his team to safety and success, despite personal doubts.
Description: A tech genius with a quirky sense of humor.. Motivation: To decipher the alien technology and make a groundbreaking discovery.
Description: A mysterious alien survivor found in stasis.. Motivation: To preserve her culture and protect the secrets of her people.
Discovered the source of the energy pulse and led the team into the alien structure.
Identifying strongest energy readings to the northeast
Successfully interfaced with the alien artifact's control panel, revealing a star map and potential network of artifacts.
Acknowledged the significance of the team's discovery and emphasized the need for caution and documentation.
Leading the team to make history
Mission commander overseeing the operation
Expressed concern over the potential dangers of the artifact and emphasized the importance of proceeding carefully.
Description: A diligent but inexperienced apprentice wizard, eager to prove himself.. Motivation: Desires to become a renowned wizard and make a positive impact in the magical community.
Description: A mischievous, centuries-old demon with a knack for trouble and giving questionable advice.. Motivation: Seeks amusement and freedom from the monotony of the demon world.
Description: A fellow apprentice and Theo's best friend, who is skeptical of Loki but loyal to Theo.. Motivation: Wants to help Theo navigate the challenges of wizardry and life.
Summoned Loki accidentally, forming an uneasy alliance with the demon.
Arrived in the human world due to Theo's summoning, forming an alliance with Theo.

Description: Older sibling, pragmatic and somewhat skeptical of the supernatural. A history teacher by profession.. Motivation: Initially seeks to sell the house and move on, but becomes deeply involved in unraveling the family's history.
Embarked on a treasure hunt with Casey after discovering a letter from their grandmother.

Description: Younger sibling, more open to the mysteries of the house and the stories it holds. An artist with a penchant for the whimsical.. Motivation: Driven by a deep sense of connection to their grandmother and a longing to understand her better.
Engaged in a treasure hunt with Alex, showing excitement and curiosity.
Description: A brilliant but disillusioned astro-archaeologist.. Motivation: Seeks to prove her theories about interstellar civilizations and find a purpose.
Description: A seasoned pilot with a mysterious past.. Motivation: Desires to leave his mark on history and protect his crew.
Description: . Motivation:
Description: A skeptical engineer who questions everything.. Motivation: Wants to debunk myths and prove the superiority of human ingenuity.

Description: The determined leader of the exploration team, with a background in both military and scientific expeditions.. Motivation: Driven by a desire to make groundbreaking discoveries that can benefit humanity.

Description: A brilliant but eccentric xenobiologist who believes that studying alien life forms can solve Earth's ecological crises.. Motivation: Seeks validation and respect from the scientific community.

Description: A skilled engineer and tech specialist, responsible for the maintenance and operation of the team's equipment.. Motivation: Wants to prove her worth beyond her technical skills, seeking adventure and a deeper purpose.
Description: A former space pirate turned security officer, providing muscle and protection for the team.. Motivation: Seeks redemption for his past crimes and a new path in life.
Description: A brilliant but disillusioned astrophysicist and the team's leader.. Motivation: Seeks redemption for a past mistake through this discovery.
Description: A seasoned astronaut and the mission's pilot, skeptical of what they'll find.. Motivation: Driven by duty and the thrill of exploration.
Description: A young, enthusiastic xenobiologist, eager to prove his theories about alien life.. Motivation: Desires to make a groundbreaking discovery.
Description: The team's engineer, specializing in alien technologies.. Motivation: Wants to unlock the secrets of the universe to benefit humanity.
